blocks.name: ismea
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` M ` is a measure." Definition 112A of [Fremlin1] p. 14. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: dmmeasal
blocks.content: The domain of a measure is a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: meaf
blocks.content: A measure is a function that maps to nonnegative extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm meaf(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmea))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(c0))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wf(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simplld(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdm(c0), csalg), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0))
  simpld(w0, wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdm(c0), csalg)), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs0, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0)))))))
  sylib(w0, wa(wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdm(c0), csalg)), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs0, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, cmea))
  ismea(hs0, hs1, c0)
  feq2d(c0, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cdm(c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cdm(c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: mea0
blocks.content: The measure of the empty set is always 0 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: nnfoctbdjlem
blocks.content: There exists a mapping from ` NN ` onto any (nonempty) countable set of disjoint sets, such that elements in the range of the map are disjoint. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnfoctbdjlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(wfo(cv(s0), cn, cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), wdisj(s1, cn, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c2, c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s2, c0, cv(s2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s1, cn, cif(emptycls, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wex(s0, wa(wfo(cv(s0), cn, cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), wdisj(s1, cn, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wfo(c3, cn, cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), wdisj(s1, cn, cfv(c3, cv(s1))))
  sylanbrc(w0, wfo(c3, cn, cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), wf(c3, cn, cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), wral(s2, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), wrex(hs0, cn, wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))))
  fmptd(s1, c3, cn, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cif(emptycls, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1)))), w0)
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cif(emptycls, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1)))), cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1))))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1))), wcel(cif(emptycls, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1)))), cun(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  syl6eqel(cif(emptycls, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1)))), cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), emptycls, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1)))))
  ax-mp(wcel(emptycls, cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), wcel(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  snid(emptycls)
  elun2(emptycls, csn(emptycls), c0)
  eqeltrd(cif(emptycls, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1)))), cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wn(wo(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wn(wcel(co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1), c1))))))

blocks.name: nnfoctbdj
blocks.content: There exists a mapping from ` NN ` onto any (nonempty) countable set of disjoint sets, such that elements in the range of the map are disjoint. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: meadjuni
blocks.content: The measure of the disjoint union of a countable set is the extended sum of the measures. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm meadjuni(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmea))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c1, cv(s0)))

} = {
  mpd(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1))), wa(wbr(c1, cdom, com), wdisj(s0, c1, cv(s0))))
  jca(w0, wbr(c1, cdom, com), wdisj(s0, c1, cv(s0)))

  mpbird(w0, wcel(c1, cpw(cdm(c0))), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  syl6sseq(c1, cdm(c0), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, cpw(cdm(c0))), wss(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, universe))
  ssexd(c1, c2, csalg, w0)
  dmmeasal(c2, c0, w0)
  elpwg(c1, universe, cdm(c0))
  simprd(w0, wral(hs0, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdm(c0), csalg)), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)))
  sylib(w0, wa(wa(wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cdm(c0), csalg)), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0)), wral(hs0, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, cmea))
  ismea(hs0, s0, c0)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0))))), wi(wa(wbr(c1, cdom, com), wdisj(s0, c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, cv(hs0)))), wa(wbr(c1, cdom, com), wdisj(s0, c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(c1)), cfv(csumge0, cres(c0, c1))))

thm meadjuni(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` ⋃ c1)=(sum^ `(c0 |` c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Meas)
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[≼]_om)
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd(w0, (c0 ` ⋃ c1)=(sum^ `(c0 |` c1)), (c1[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, s0)))
  jca(w0, c1[≼]_om, ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, s0))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c1[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, s0))→(c0 ` ⋃ c1)=(sum^ `(c0 |` c1))), c1 ∈ P(dom(c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ P(dom(c0)),((hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ hs0, s0))→(c0 ` ⋃ hs0)=(sum^ `(c0 |` hs0)))))
  mpbird(w0, c1 ∈ P(dom(c0)), c1 ⊆ dom(c0))
  syl6sseq(c1, dom(c0), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ∈ P(dom(c0))↔ c1 ⊆ dom(c0)), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexd(c1, c2, csalg, w0)
  dmmeasal(c2, c0, w0)
  elpwg(c1, universe, dom(c0))
  simprd(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(dom(c0)),((hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ hs0, s0))→(c0 ` ⋃ hs0)=(sum^ `(c0 |` hs0)))), (((c0 : dom(c0)→(0[[,]]+∞))∧ dom(c0)∈ SAlg)∧(c0 ` ∅)= 0))
  sylib(w0, ((((c0 : dom(c0)→(0[[,]]+∞))∧ dom(c0)∈ SAlg)∧(c0 ` ∅)= 0)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ P(dom(c0)),((hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ hs0, s0))→(c0 ` ⋃ hs0)=(sum^ `(c0 |` hs0))))), c0 ∈ Meas)
  ismea(hs0, s0, c0)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, P(dom(c0)), ((hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ hs0, s0))→(c0 ` ⋃ hs0)=(sum^ `(c0 |` hs0))), ((c1[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, s0))→(c0 ` ⋃ c1)=(sum^ `(c0 |` c1))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, (hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ hs0, s0)), (c0 ` ⋃ hs0)=(sum^ `(c0 |` hs0)), (c1[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, s0)), (c0 ` ⋃ c1)=(sum^ `(c0 |` c1)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0[≼]_om, ⊔(s0 ∈ hs0, s0), c1[≼]_om, ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, s0))
  breq1(hs0, c1, cdom, com)
  disjeq1(s0, hs0, c1, s0)
  eqeq12d((c0 ` ⋃ hs0), (sum^ `(c0 |` hs0)), (c0 ` ⋃ c1), (sum^ `(c0 |` c1)), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2d(c0, ⋃ hs0, ⋃ c1, hs0 = c1)
  unieq(hs0, c1)
  fveq2d(csumge0, (c0 |` hs0), (c0 |` c1), hs0 = c1)
  reseq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

thm meassle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
} = {
  breqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2), co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), w0)
  xadd0ge(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1)), w0)
  meaxrcl(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  meacl(c0, cdif(c2, c1), c3, w0)
  eqtr2d(co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1))), w0)
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1))), w0)

thm meassle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)[≤](c0 ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Meas)
  ⊣ c3 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ c2)
} = {
  breqtrd((c0 ` c1), cle, (c0 ` c2), ((c0 ` c1)[+](c0 `(c2 \ c1))), w0)
  xadd0ge((c0 ` c1), (c0 `(c2 \ c1)), w0)
  meaxrcl(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  meacl(c0, (c2 \ c1), c3, w0)
  eqtr2d(((c0 ` c1)[+](c0 `(c2 \ c1))), (c0 ` c2), (c0 `(c1 ⋃(c2 \ c1))), w0)
  eqcomd((c0 ` c2), (c0 `(c1 ⋃(c2 \ c1))), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, (c1 ⋃(c2 \ c1)), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ⋃(c2 \ c1))= c2, c1 ⊆ c2)
  biimpi(c1 ⊆ c2, (c1 ⋃(c2 \ c1))= c2)
  undif(c1, c2)
  meadjun(c0, c1, (c2 \ c1), c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c2 \ c1)∈ c3, c3 ∈ SAlg, c2 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ c3)
  dmmeasal(c3, c0, w0)
  saldifcl2(c3, c2, c1)
  a1i(w0, (c1 ⋂(c2 \ c1))= ∅)
  disjdif(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: meaunle
blocks.content: The measure of the union of two sets is less than or equal to the sum of the measures, Property 112C (c) of [Fremlin1] p. 15. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm meaunle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

} = {
  eqbrtrd(cfv(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cle, co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, cun(c1, c2)), co(cfv(c0, c1), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(c2, c1))), cfv(c0, cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cfv(c0, cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1)))))
  fveq2i(c0, cun(c1, c2), cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1)))
  eqcomi(cun(c1, c2), cun(c1, cdif(c2, c1)))

  meadjun(c0, c1, cdif(c2, c1), c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(c1, cdif(c2, c1)), emptycls))
  disjdif(c1, c2)

  meaxrcl(c0, cdif(c2, c1), c3, w0)
  meaxrcl(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  meaxrcl(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  meassle(c0, cdif(c2, c1), c2, c3, w0)

}

thm meaunle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 `(c1 ⋃ c2))[≤]((c0 ` c1)[+](c0 ` c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Meas)
  ⊣ c3 = dom(c0)

  meassle(c0, (c2 \ c1), c2, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c2 \ c1)∈ c3, c3 ∈ SAlg, c2 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ c3)

blocks.name: meadjiun
blocks.content: The measure of the disjoint union of a countable set is the extended sum of the measures. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

  bitrd(w0, wdisj(hs1, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs1))), wdisj(s0, c1, c2), wdisj(hs1, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))
  disjeq2dv(hs1, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), c3))

  chvar(s0, hs1, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), c3)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3)))

  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c1)
  eleq1d(c2, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  eqidd(cmpt(hs1, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), w0)

  eqcomi(cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, c2)))

  nfcv(hs1, cfv(c0, c2))
  nffv(s0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))

  nfcsb1(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  fveq2d(c0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs2, c1, wne(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), emptycls)))

  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2))=(sum^ `(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` c2))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Meas)
  ⊣ c3 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[≼]_om)
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)

  3eqtrd((c0 ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), (sum^ `(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` c2))), (c0 ` ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))), (sum^ `(c0 |` ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c1, c2), ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), w0)

  neeq1d(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs2), emptycls, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs1), hs2 = hs1)

  bitrd(w0, ⊔(hs1 ∈ c1,((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs1)), ⊔(s0 ∈ c1, c2), ⊔(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2))
  disjeq2dv(hs1, c1, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs1), [hs1 / s0]c2, w0)

  simpr(w0, hs1 ∈ c1)

blocks.name: meaiunlelem
blocks.content: The measure of the union of countable sets is less than or equal to the sum of the measures, Property 112C (d) of [Fremlin1] p. 16. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: meaiunle
blocks.content: The measure of the union of countable sets is less than or equal to the sum of the measures, Property 112C (d) of [Fremlin1] p. 16. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm meaiunle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmea))
  -| wceq(c3, cdm(c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  meaiunlelem(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cmpt(s0, c1, cdif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), ciun(hs0, co(c4, cfzo, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, cdif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), ciun(hs0, co(c4, cfzo, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ` s0)))[≤](sum^ `(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 `(c2 ` s0)))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)

  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  meaiunlelem(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦((c2 ` s0)\ ⋃(hs0 ∈(c4[..^]s0),(c2 ` hs0)))), w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦((c2 ` s0)\ ⋃(hs0 ∈(c4[..^]s0),(c2 ` hs0)))))

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

  fveq2d(csumge0, (c4 |` s0), (c4 |` s1), s0 = s1)

  biimpri(wdisj(hs1, cn, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wdisj(hs2, cn, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))

  simp2(w0, wf(cv(hs0), cn, cdm(cvol)), wdisj(hs2, cn, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))

blocks.name: meaiuninc
blocks.content: Measures are continuous from below (bounded case): if ` E ` is a sequence of nondecreasing measurable sets (with bounded measure) then the measure of the union is the limit of the measures. This is Proposition 112C (e) of [Fremlin1] p. 16. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: meaiuninc2
blocks.content: Measures are continuous from below (bounded case): if ` E ` is a sequence of nondecreasing measurable sets (with bounded measure) then the measure of the union is the limit of the measures. This is Proposition 112C (e) of [Fremlin1] p. 16. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: meaiuninc3v
blocks.content: Measures are continuous from below: if ` E ` is a sequence of nondecreasing measurable sets (with bounded measure) then the measure of the union is the limit of the measures. This is the general case of Proposition 112C (e) of [Fremlin1] p. 16 . This theorem generalizes ~ meaiuninc and ~ meaiuninc2 where the sequence is required to be bounded. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 13-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: meaiuninc3
blocks.content: Measures are continuous from below: if ` E ` is a sequence of nondecreasing measurable sets (with bounded measure) then the measure of the union is the limit of the measures. This is the general case of Proposition 112C (e) of [Fremlin1] p. 16 . This theorem generalizes ~ meaiuninc and ~ meaiuninc2 where the sequence is required to be bounded. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 13-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm meaiuninc3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clsxlim, cfv(c1, ciun(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmea))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c2, cdm(c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6breq(c0, clsxlim, cfv(c1, ciun(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), cfv(c1, ciun(hs0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  meaiuninc3v(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfss(s0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  nffv(s0, c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  nfcv(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  sseq12d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c3)

  cbviun(hs0, s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0)))

blocks.pretty:
thm meaiuninc3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>*](c1 ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c2,(c3 ` s0))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Meas)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : c2 → dom(c1)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` s0)⊆(c3 `(s0[+]1)))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1 `(c3 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6breq(c0, clsxlim, (c1 ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c2,(c3 ` s0))), (c1 ` ⋃(hs0 ∈ c2,(c3 ` hs0))), w0)

blocks.name: meaiininclem
blocks.content: Measures are continuous from above: if ` E ` is a nonincreasing sequence of measurable sets, and any of the sets has finite measure, then the measure of the intersection is the limit of the measures. This is Proposition 112C (f) of [Fremlin1] p. 16. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: meaiininc
blocks.content: Measures are continuous from above: if ` E ` is a nonincreasing sequence of measurable sets, and any of the sets has finite measure, then the measure of the intersection is the limit of the measures. This is Proposition 112C (f) of [Fremlin1] p. 16. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)

thm meaiininc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>](c1 ` ⋂(s0 ∈ c2,(c3 ` s0))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Meas)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : c2 → dom(c1)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c3 `(s0[+]1))⊆(c3 ` s0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 `(c3 ` c5))∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1 `(c3 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[~~>](c1 ` ⋂(s0 ∈ c2,(c3 ` s0))), (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1 `(c3 ` hs0)))[~~>](c1 ` ⋂(hs1 ∈ c2,(c3 ` hs1))))
  meaiininclem(hs1, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1 `(c3 ` hs0))), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` c5)\(c3 ` s0))), ⋃(hs0 ∈ c2,((s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c3 ` c5)\(c3 ` s0)))` hs0)), w0)
  chvar(s0, hs1, ((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)→(c3 `(hs1[+]1))⊆(c3 ` hs1)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c3 `(s0[+]1))⊆(c3 ` s0)))

blocks.name: meaiininc2
blocks.content: Measures are continuous from above: if ` E ` is a nonincreasing sequence of measurable sets, and any of the sets has finite measure, then the measure of the intersection is the limit of the measures. This is Proposition 112C (f) of [Fremlin1] p. 16. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm meaiininc2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(c1, ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmea))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c2, cdm(c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wss(cfv(c3, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, c2, wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(c1, ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, c2, wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr)))
  rexlimd(s1, c2, w0, wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(c1, ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  nfv(s1, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(c1, ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(c1, ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  meaiininc(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cv(s1), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr)))
  nf3an(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr), wcel(c1, cmea))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr), wcel(c4, cz))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr), wf(c3, c2, cdm(c1)))
  3ad2antl1(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wss(cfv(c3, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  3ad2ant2(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cuz, c4)))
  syl6eleq(cv(s1), cfv(cuz, c4), c2, wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  id(wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  simp3(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, cli, cfv(c1, ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  diff.ciin.s(s1, s0, c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c3, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)

}
